perplexity.description: Perplexity AI search and chat integration

instructions: Install: Clone https://github.com/your-repo/perplexity-mcp
Build: npm install && npm run build
Get API key from: https://www.perplexity.ai/settings/api
Replace YOUR_PERPLEXITY_API_KEY_HERE with your actual key

playwright.description: Browser automation and testing with Playwright

instructions: No installation needed - uses npx to run latest version
First run may take a moment to download package

codex.description: Codex MCP server for enhanced code operations

instructions: Install codex CLI tool first
Follow installation instructions at codex documentation
No installation needed - HTTP endpoint
Public API, no authentication required

chrome-devtools.description: Chrome DevTools integration for browser debugging

instructions: No installation needed - uses npx to run latest version
Chrome browser should be installed on the system

figma.description: Figma design file integration and conversion

instructions: No installation needed - HTTP endpoint
May require Figma authentication for private files

supabase.description: Supabase database integration for PostgreSQL operations

instructions: Get your project ref from Supabase dashboard (Settings > General)
Generate access token from: https://supabase.com/dashboard/account/tokens
Replace YOUR_PROJECT_REF_HERE with your project reference
Replace YOUR_SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN_HERE with your token
Generate personal access token from: https://app.netlify.com/user/applications
Replace YOUR_NETLIFY_AUTH_TOKEN_HERE with your token

telnyx.description: Telnyx telephony, messaging, and AI assistant APIs

instructions: Install uv/uvx first: curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh
Or via Homebrew: brew install uv
Get API key from: https://portal.telnyx.com/#/app/api-keys
Replace YOUR_TELNYX_API_KEY_HERE with your actual key
Provides: phone number management, SMS/MMS, voice calls, AI assistants

twilio.description: Twilio SMS and Voice API integration - send messages, manage conversations, validate phone numbers

instructions: Clone: git clone https://github.com/your-org/twilio-mcp-server
Install: cd twilio-mcp-server && npm install && npm run build
Update args path to your local twilio-mcp-server location
Get credentials from: https://console.twilio.com/
Account SID and Auth Token: Console Dashboard > Account Info
Phone Number: Phone Numbers > Manage > Active numbers
Replace YOUR_TWILIO_* placeholders with actual values

filesystem.description: Enhanced filesystem access for specific directories

instructions: Replace paths with directories you want to grant access to
Example: '/Users/yourname/Desktop/Projects'
Multiple directories can be specified as separate arguments
Provides enhanced file operations beyond default Claude Code tools

context7.description: Context7 library documentation - up-to-date docs and code examples for any library

instructions: No installation needed - HTTP endpoint
Public API, no authentication required
Provides: resolve-library-id, get-library-docs
Use resolve-library-id first to get Context7-compatible library ID
Then use get-library-docs with that ID to fetch documentation

mcp-google-sheets.description: Google Sheets integration for reading, writing, and managing spreadsheets

instructions: Create Google Cloud project: https://console.cloud.google.com/
Enable Google Sheets API: APIs & Services > Library > Google Sheets API
Enable Google Drive API: APIs & Services > Library > Google Drive API
Create service account: IAM & Admin > Service Accounts > Create
Download JSON key file and save as ~/.claude/google-sheets-service-account.json
Set SERVICE_ACCOUNT_PATH to the JSON file location
Get DRIVE_FOLDER_ID from Google Drive folder URL (the ID after /folders/)
Share Drive folder with service account email for access
Provides: get_sheet_data, update_cells, batch_update, list_sheets, create_spreadsheet, share_spreadsheet

arxiv.description: ArXiv academic paper search, download, and analysis (2k+ GitHub stars)

instructions: Install uv first: curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh
Or via Homebrew: brew install uv
Install server: uv tool install arxiv-mcp-server
Papers stored locally at ~/.arxiv-papers for faster access
Provides: search_papers, download_paper, list_papers, read_paper
Includes deep-paper-analysis prompt for comprehensive paper review
GitHub: https://github.com/blazickjp/arxiv-mcp-server (2k+ stars)
